database.name: VIEW SWA_BOMSRESULTBOM_V
database.view: SELECT s.swa_bom_search_resultline_id || b.m_productbom_id AS swa_bomsresultbom_v_id, s.ad_client_id, s.ad_org_id, s.isactive, s.created, s.createdby, s.updated, s.updatedby, s.swa_bom_search_resultline_id, b.line, b.m_productbom_id, b.bomqty, b.description, b.bomtype FROM swa_bom_search_resultline s, m_product_bom b WHERE s.m_product_id = b.m_product_id ORDER BY b.line
